buildCommand: echo '[BUILD START] Starting build at:' && date && echo '[BUILD] Installing client dependencies...' && cd client && npm ci --audit=false --silent && echo '[BUILD] Client deps installed at:' && date && echo '[BUILD] Building React app...' && npm run build && echo '[BUILD] Build completed at:' && date
installCommand: echo '[INSTALL START] Starting install at:' && date && echo '[INSTALL] Installing root dependencies...' && npm install --audit=false --silent && echo '[INSTALL] Root deps done at:' && date && echo '[INSTALL] Installing client dependencies...' && cd client && npm install --audit=false --silent && echo '[INSTALL COMPLETE] All installs done at:' && date
